attributes.action: Remove Glaxo (GSK) from the board of OFSTED immediatly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is morally and ethically wrong to have drug company Glaxo (GSK) on the board of OFSTED.  Please sign this petition and call for the removal of Glaxo from OFSTED and put the education, health and safety of children first.

rejection.details: Since the submission of the petition the individual concerned is no longer an Ofsted board member.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
